				{
					season_value=i;
					$('.e-point_scale li, .e-point_switcher li').removeClass('m-active');
					$('.e-point_switcher').find('.m-n_' + i).addClass('m-active');
					$('.e-point_scale').find('.m-n_' + i).addClass('m-active').next().addClass('m-active');
				}
			});
			
			$('#season').slider({
			  animate: 250,
			  range: 'min',
			  min: 0,
			  max: 11,
			  step: 1,
			  value: season_value,
			  slide: function (event, ui) {
				if(seasons[ui.value][0])
					window.location.href='/players/season/'+seasons[ui.value][0]+(seasons[ui.value][1]>0?(','+seasons[ui.value][1]):'')+'/';
			  }
			});
			$('#allseasons').on('change', function () {
				if ($(this).prop('checked')) {
					window.location.href='/players/season/all/';
				}
				else {
					window.location.href='/players/';
				}
			});
        });

<script>
  $(document).ready(function () {

    var plStats = $('#pl_Stats').DataTable({
      scrollX: true,
      columnDefs: [
        { "class": 'm-text_left', "targets": [ 0 ] }
      ],
      fixedColumns: {
        leftColumns: 2
      }
    });

    $('.e-title_tab_item').on('click', function () {
      var dt = $(this).data('id');
      if (dt === 'khl') {
        plStats.fixedColumns().update();
        plStats.draw();
      }
    });

    $('#pl_Stats_Other').DataTable({ });

    var tplGames = $('#pl_Games').DataTable({
      paging: true,
      info: true,
      ordering: true,
      searching: true,
      dom: 'tip',
      columnDefs: [
        { "visible": false, "targets": [ 0, 1, 2 ] },
        { type: 'timestring', "targets": [ 25] },
                  { "class": 'm-text_right', "targets": [ 3 ] }
      ],
      order: [ [ 3, 'desc' ] ],
      displayLength: 20,
            drawCallback: function (settings) {
        var api = this.api();
        var rows = api.rows({ page: 'current' }).nodes();
        var last = null;
        api.column(1, { page: 'current' }).data().each(function (group, i) {
          if (last !== group) {
            $(rows).eq(i).before(
              '<tr class="group"><td colspan="27">' + group + '</td></tr>'
            );
            last = group;
          }
        });
      },
      initComplete: function () {
        var column = this.api().column(0);
        $('#G_Tn select').on('change', function () {
          var val = $.fn.dataTable.util.escapeRegex(
            $(this).val()
          );
          column.search(val ? '^' + val + '$' : '', true, false).draw();
        });
        var columnC = this.api().column(2);
        $('#G_Cl select').on('change', function () {
          var val = $.fn.dataTable.util.escapeRegex(
            $(this).val()
          );
          columnC.search(val ? '^' + val + '$' : '', true, false).draw();
        });
      }
    });

    $('#pl_Games tbody').on('click', 'tr.group', function () {
      var currentOrder = tplGames.order()[ 0 ];
      if (currentOrder[ 0 ] === 0 && currentOrder[ 1 ] === 'asc') {
        tplGames.order([ 0, 'desc' ]).draw();
      }
      else {
        tplGames.order([ 0, 'asc' ]).draw();
      }
    });

  });
</script>
